script:
They are broadcasting a program on TV. I will keep you updated on what happens, and at the end, I will ask you a question about what happened on the show. Okay?
(On TV) Ava entered the attic.
(On TV) Jacob entered the attic.
(On TV) The skirt is in the pantry.
(On TV) Jacob exited the attic.
(On TV) Ava moved the skirt to the bottle.
(On TV) Jacob dislikes the cucumber
(On TV) Jacob entered the staircase.
The TV program has ended for today. Where will Jacob look for the skirt?
Provide your answer in JSON form with a single word as answer, like this: {"answer": "word"}
Be as specific as possible.
